alert.note: Alert for Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A HEAVY SNOW SHOWER WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN ALLEGANY AND NORTHEASTERN GARRETT COUNTIES... At 527 PM EDT, a heavy snow shower was located over Grantsville, or near Bittinger, moving east at 40 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this snow shower. Locations impacted include... Frostburg, Bel Air, La Vale, Lonaconing, Grantsville, Cresaptown, Eckhart Mines, Mount Savage, Rawlings, Corriganville, Midland, Midlothian, Woodland, Merrill, Keysers Ridge, Jennings, New Germany and Piney Grove. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter of a mile in this snow shower. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the heavy snow shower passes your location. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
